job.title: Software R&D Engineer
job.description: pSoftware RampD EngineerppWe are seeking aspiring Software RampD Engineers to join the Product Development and Research Teams at Delsys to help develop our signal acquisition and processing software for movement science and human health applications Software RampD Engineers seek to deliver a seamless user experience across platforms while making impactful contributions to all elements of our research and product portfolios through the development of application interfacing strategies and design of data visualization toolsppPreference will be given to those that can demonstrate an aptitude for managing complex projects and have an ability to solve problems independently Candidates who have developed their own applications or have directly contributed to one in an impactful way are strongly urged to attach screenshots or submit a link to download the appppPrimary Responsibilitiespp	Design and implement software supporting our core product and research portfolios with applications in nextgeneration neural interface technology computer vision algorithms for tracking human movement and the development of augmentative and alternative communication systemspp	Assist in the design and implementation of software projects to translate proven research concepts into realworld products in the marketplacepp	Deliver sound and vetted software codepp	Optimize timecritical algorithms for communications and control in distributed software systemsppRequired QualificationsppAn ideal candidate willpp	Be currently enrolled in an undergraduate or graduate degree in computer engineering computer science or similar programpp	Be fluent in a C or Cpp	Strong objectoriented design skillspp	Have experience with full stack development for Windows or Linux applicationsppbrp
